title: Babies Before the Marriage ( Brother Nuri Muhammad)
itunes:title: Babies Before the Marriage ( Brother Nuri Muhammad)
description:
Today on the show after a lot of discussion about Ukraine vs Russia, we opened the phone lines to see if our listeners can or can't relate to Cam Newtons reasoning of why he never married the mother of his 4 kids. Also, with Charlamagne not in, we then gave the listeners a chance to nominate someone for "Donkey of the Day". Moreover, we had Brother Nuri Muhammad stop by where he spoke on unity, healing & The Minister's upcoming speech "The Swan Song".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show after a lot of discussion about Ukraine vs Russia, we opened the phone lines to see if our listeners can or can't relate to Cam Newtons reasoning of why he never married the mother of his 4 kids. Also, with Charlamagne not in, we then gave the listeners a chance to nominate someone for "Donkey of the Day". Moreover, we had Brother Nuri Muhammad stop by where he spoke on unity, healing & The Minister's upcoming speech "The Swan Song".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
